Original: 這間飛鏢酒吧真的是我近期最棒的發現！環境氛圍絕佳，燈光和音樂讓人感覺既放鬆又有活力。飛鏢設備非常專業，而且工作人員很友善，會耐心指導新手怎麼玩。酒單也非常豐富，調酒非常好喝，價格合理。無論是想和朋友一起來小酌，還是想體驗飛鏢的樂趣，這裡都是絕佳的選擇。已經迫不及待想下次再來了！強烈推薦！
EN: This dart bar is really my best discovery recently!The environment atmosphere is excellent, and the lights and music make people feel both relaxed and energetic.The dart equipment is very professional, and the staff is very friendly to patiently guide the novice how to play.The wine list is also very rich. The bartender is very delicious and the price is reasonable.Whether you want to have a drink with your friends, or you want to experience the fun of darts, this is an excellent choice.I can't wait to come again next time!Recommended strongly!
